home.why1Text: From design to launch and promotion — all in one team

home.why3Text: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, Python — using cutting-edge technologies

home.step1Text: Free consultation, task analysis, requirements specification

home.faq1Q: How much does website development cost?
home.faq1A: The cost depends on the type: landing page from 30,000 RUB, business card site from 40,000 RUB, e-commerce from 70,000 RUB. We'll calculate the exact price after discussing your project.
home.faq2A: Landing page — from 5 business days, business card — from 10 days, e-commerce — from 20 days. Timelines depend on project complexity.
home.faq3A: Yes, we provide 6 months of free technical support after website launch.
home.faq4Q: Do you work with clients from other cities?
home.faq4A: Yes, we work remotely with clients across Russia and internationally. Communication via messengers, video calls, and email.
home.faq5A: WordPress, Bitrix, Tilda, OpenCart — we choose the platform based on project requirements. We also develop with pure code for maximum performance.
home.ctaText: Leave a request, and we'll contact you within an hour. Consultation is free.

dev.heroSubtitle: Landing pages, business cards, corporate sites, and e-commerce. Responsive design, modern stack, SEO optimization from day one.
dev.includesDesign: Unique design tailored to your brand identity
dev.includesCoding: Coding and programming on a modern stack
dev.includesCms: CMS integration for easy content management
dev.includesSeo: Basic SEO optimization and meta tag setup
dev.includesHosting: Help with hosting selection and setup
dev.faq1q: How long does website development take?
dev.faq1a: Timelines depend on project complexity. We build a landing page in 5-7 business days, a business card site in 7-10 days, a corporate site from 2 weeks, an e-commerce store from 3 weeks. Exact timelines are discussed after creating the technical specification.
dev.faq2q: Can I manage the website myself afterwards?
dev.faq2a: Yes, all websites are built on user-friendly CMS platforms that anyone can handle. After project delivery, we provide training and a content management guide.
dev.faq3q: What do you need to get started?
dev.faq3a: To start, we just need a filled brief or a verbal description of your task. We'll create a technical specification, approve it with you, then proceed to design and development. You can provide content (texts, photos) or we can prepare it additionally.
dev.ctaText: Leave a request, and we'll contact you within an hour for a free consultation.

crm.heroSubtitle: We automate sales and customer service. We'll select, configure, and integrate a CRM system for your business needs.
crm.amoDesc: Ideal for sales teams. Simple interface, powerful sales funnel, messenger and telephony integration. Suitable for small and medium businesses.
crm.bitrixDesc: Comprehensive platform: CRM, tasks, communications, document management. Cloud and on-premise versions available. Optimal for medium and large companies.
crm.megaplanDesc: Combines CRM and project management. Convenient for project-based companies: task, deadline, and finance control in one window.
crm.featureAudit: Business process analysis and CRM system selection
crm.featureSetup: Sales funnel setup, statuses, and fields configuration
crm.featureIntegration: Integration with telephony, email, and messengers
crm.featureImport: Client database and deal history import
crm.featureSupport: Technical support and customization after implementation
crm.faq1q: Which CRM should I choose for my business?
crm.faq1a: The choice depends on your business specifics. For active sales and small teams, we recommend AmoCRM. For companies with a developed structure and document management needs — Bitrix24. For project-based business — Megaplan. We'll help select the optimal option after analyzing your processes.
crm.faq2q: How long does CRM implementation take?
crm.faq2a: Basic setup takes 3-5 business days. Comprehensive implementation with integrations and automation — from 2 to 4 weeks. Timelines depend on the number of integrations and business process complexity.
crm.faq3q: Can you migrate data from another CRM?
crm.faq3a: Yes, we perform data migration from any CRM systems, Excel spreadsheets, and other sources. We transfer contacts, deals, interaction history, and documents. The process runs without data loss or work interruptions.
crm.ctaText: Leave a request for a free consultation. We'll select a CRM system and calculate the implementation cost.

seo.heroSubtitle: We bring websites to the TOP-10 of Yandex and Google. Comprehensive optimization, content marketing, link building, and analytics for stable traffic growth.
seo.includesAudit: Complete technical and SEO audit of the website
seo.includesSemantic: Semantic core collection and query clustering
seo.includesOnPage: On-page optimization: meta tags, headings, internal linking
seo.includesContent: Content creation and optimization for search queries
seo.includesLinks: Link mass building and link building
seo.step1Desc: We conduct a full technical and SEO audit of the website. We identify errors, growth points, and create a promotion strategy.
seo.step2Desc: We fix technical errors, optimize structure, meta tags, loading speed, and internal linking.
seo.step3Desc: We create and publish optimized content: articles, descriptions, landing pages. We expand the semantic coverage of the website.
seo.step4Desc: We track rankings, traffic, and conversions. We adjust the strategy based on data for maximum results.
seo.faq1q: When will I see the first results from SEO?
seo.faq1a: First improvements in rankings are noticeable within 1-2 months after starting work. Stable traffic growth is usually observed from month 3-4. The full effect of SEO promotion unfolds over 6-12 months of systematic work.
seo.faq2a: We don't provide 100% guarantees on specific positions — this contradicts search engine policies. However, we guarantee organic traffic and website visibility growth. Based on experience, 80-90% of promoted queries reach TOP-10 within 6 months.
seo.faq3q: Do I need to change my website for SEO promotion?
seo.faq3a: Not always. After the audit, we'll provide a list of recommendations. Often, it's enough to make technical fixes and optimize content. If the site is severely outdated or has critical issues, a redesign or upgrade may be needed — we can help with that too.
seo.ctaText: Order a free SEO audit of your website. We'll show growth points and create a promotion plan.

support.heroSubtitle: System administration, website support, 1C maintenance. 24/7 monitoring, fast response, and predictable budget.
support.sysadminDesc: Server, network equipment, and workstation setup and maintenance. Infrastructure monitoring, backup, and information security.
support.webSupportDesc: Website technical maintenance: CMS and plugin updates, bug fixing, availability monitoring, backup, hack protection.
support.oneCDesc: 1C installation, setup, and updates. Configuration customization for your business processes, bank and external system integration, employee training.
support.featureResponse: Response time for critical incidents — up to 30 minutes
support.featureSecurity: Information security and antivirus protection setup
support.featureManager: Personal manager and dedicated team of specialists
support.featureBudget: Fixed monthly cost with no hidden fees
support.priceComplexDesc: Full turnkey IT support for your company
support.faq1q: How quickly do you respond to requests?
support.faq1a: Critical incidents (server down, website not working) are handled within 30 minutes. Standard requests — within 2-4 business hours. Each client has a direct communication channel with the responsible engineer.
support.faq2q: Can I get support for the website only?
support.faq2a: Yes, you can choose any area separately: website support only, system administration only, or 1C support only. A comprehensive package with a discount is also available.
support.faq3q: What's included in the monthly report?
support.faq3a: The report includes: list of completed work and resolved incidents, monitoring data (uptime, server load), backup status, infrastructure improvement recommendations, and work plan for the next month.
support.ctaText: Leave a request, and we'll offer the optimal support plan for your company.

about.heroSubtitle: We are a team of professionals with 10+ years of IT experience
about.missionText1: We believe that modern technologies should be accessible to every business. Our mission is to help companies grow and develop in the digital space by providing quality IT solutions at a fair price.
about.missionText2: Since 2014, we've been building websites, implementing CRM systems, and promoting businesses online. During this time, we've completed over 200 projects for companies across various industries — from construction and healthcare to logistics and e-commerce.
about.teamMarketingDesc: They analyze the market, develop promotion strategies, and attract targeted traffic to your website.
about.teamDesignDesc: They create modern and user-friendly designs that make your brand stand out from competitors.
about.teamDevDesc: They turn design into clean, fast, and reliable code. They work with WordPress, Bitrix, OpenCart, and other platforms.
about.teamManagersDesc: They coordinate projects and ensure quality and deadline compliance at every stage of work.
about.principleQualityDesc: Every project undergoes multi-level testing. We don't deliver work until we're sure of its excellence.
about.principleTransparencyDesc: Open communication at all stages. You always know the current stage of your project and where the budget is being spent.
about.principleResponsibilityDesc: We meet deadlines and fulfill obligations. Every project is backed by a contract and guarantees.
about.principleInnovationDesc: We constantly study new technologies and implement best practices to create modern solutions.
about.partnersText: We are certified partners of leading IT platforms and services: Bitrix24, AmoCRM, Yandex, Tilda, 1C-Bitrix, OpenCart, WordPress. This allows us to offer proven solutions and provide top-level technical support.
about.ctaText: Contact us, and we'll discuss your tasks and offer the optimal solution

privacy.section1Text1: This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for processing and protecting personal data of users of the friendadmin.ru website (hereinafter — the Site), operated by FriendAdmin web studio (hereinafter — the Operator).
privacy.section1Text2: By using the Site and providing personal data through feedback forms, the user agrees to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If the user does not agree to the terms of the Policy, they must stop using the Site.
privacy.section1Text3: The Operator processes personal data in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ dated July 27, 2006 'On Personal Data'.
privacy.section2Text1: The Operator may collect the following personal data voluntarily provided by the user through feedback forms on the Site:
privacy.section2Item4: Other data voluntarily provided by the user in the message.
privacy.section2Text2: Technical data is also automatically collected: IP address, browser type, visit time, pages viewed, and other statistical information.
privacy.section3Text1: Personal data of users is processed for the following purposes:
privacy.section3Item1: Contacting the user to process requests and applications;
privacy.section3Item2: Providing services listed on the Site;
privacy.section3Item3: Improving the quality of the Site and services provided;
privacy.section3Item5: Sending informational and promotional materials (with user consent).
privacy.section4Text1: The Operator ensures the safety of personal data and takes all necessary organizational and technical measures to protect it from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section4Text2: Users' personal data is not shared with third parties, except as required by the current legislation of the Russian Federation, and in cases where sharing is necessary to provide services to the user (e.g., hosting providers, analytics services).
privacy.section4Text3: Personal data is stored no longer than required by the purposes of processing, or until consent is withdrawn by the user.
privacy.section5Text1: The Site uses cookies to ensure proper operation, improve usability, and collect analytical information. Cookies are small text files that are saved in the user's browser.
privacy.section5Text2: The following types of cookies are used on the Site:
privacy.section5Item1: Technical cookies — necessary for the Site to function;
privacy.section5Item2: Analytical cookies — used to collect visit statistics (Google Analytics, Yandex.Metrica);
privacy.section5Item3: Marketing cookies — used to display relevant advertising.
privacy.section5Text3: The user can disable cookies in their browser settings, however this may affect the Site's functionality.
privacy.section6Text1: The user has the right to:
privacy.section6Item1: Request information about stored personal data;
privacy.section6Item2: Demand correction of inaccurate or incomplete data;
privacy.section6Item3: Demand deletion of their personal data;
privacy.section6Item4: Withdraw consent to personal data processing.
privacy.section6Text2: To exercise these rights, the user may send a request by email or through the contact details specified in section 7 of this Policy.
privacy.section7Text1: For all questions related to personal data processing, you can contact us:
privacy.section7Text2: This Privacy Policy may be updated. The current version is always available on this page of the Site.
